dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect and process the following personal data:

• **Master data:** Name, email address, phone number
• **Health data:** Symptom diaries, therapy notes, screening results (special category under Art. 9 GDPR)
• **Usage data:** Login times, session duration (anonymized)
• **Communication data:** Video/audio data during therapy sessions (not stored)

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.content:
We process your data exclusively for the following purposes:

• Conducting teletherapy sessions
• Managing your patient account
• Documenting therapy progress
• Communication between patient and therapist
• Reminders for appointments and medications

Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (contract performance) and Art. 9(2)(h) GDPR (healthcare)

storage.title: 4. Storage and Security
storage.content:
Your data is stored according to the highest security standards:

• **Encryption:** AES-256-GCM for all stored data
• **Transmission:** TLS 1.3 for all connections
• **Storage location:** Servers in the European Union
• **Access control:** Only authorized therapists have access to your data
• **Backup:** Daily encrypted backups

retention.title: 5. Retention Period
retention.content:
We only store your data as long as necessary for the processing purpose:

• **Master data:** Until deletion of your account
• **Therapy documentation:** 10 years after end of treatment (legal retention requirement)
• **Communication data:** Not stored

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

• **Access (Art. 15):** You can request information about your stored data at any time
• **Rectification (Art. 16):** You can have incorrect data corrected
• **Erasure (Art. 17):** You can request deletion of your data (subject to legal retention periods)
• **Restriction (Art. 18):** You can request restriction of processing
• **Data portability (Art. 20):** You can receive your data in a common format
• **Objection (Art. 21):** You can object to processing

thirdParties.title: 7. Disclosure to Third Parties
thirdParties.content:
We only share your data with third parties in the following cases:

• With your explicit consent
• To fulfill legal obligations
• To processors (e.g., hosting providers) in compliance with Art. 28 GDPR

No transfer to third countries outside the EU takes place.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content:
We only use technically necessary cookies:

• **Session cookie:** For authentication
• **Language setting:** For your preferred language

We do not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics tools.

changes.title: 9. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy if necessary. The current version is always available on our website. You will be informed by email of significant changes.

contact.title: 10. Contact and Right to Complain
contact.content:
For questions about data protection or to exercise your rights, please contact:

privacy@abu-abbad.de

You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, e.g., the Data Protection Commissioner of your federal state.
